flawed_nl_solution:
The first crane is 14.000000000000002 percent taller because if 200 + 200x = 228 then x=14.000000000000002/100
The second crane is 20 percent taller because if 100 + 100x = 120 then x = 20/100
The third crane is 5 percent taller because if 140 + 140x = 147 then x = 5/100
The total percent is 39 because 14.000000000000002 + 20 + 5 = <<14.000000000000002+20+5=39>>39
The average percent greater the height of the crane is than the building is 31 because 39 / 3 = <<39/3=31>>31

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13.0, not 31.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
